text: Cave City is an unincorporated community in Calaveras County, California. It lies at an elevation of and is located at . The community is in ZIP code 95222 and area code 209. Like most communities in Calaveras County, Cave City began as a mining town. However, its only claim to fame today is that it is the location of the California Caverns, the most extensive system of caverns and passageways in the area. ==Politics== In the state legislature, Cave City is in , and . Federally, Cave City is in . ==References== ==External links== * Category:Unincorporated communities in California Category:Unincorporated communities in Calaveras County, California
title: Cave City, California
